attributes.content: ♪ Do you hear the thunderclap? ♪
♪ See the clouds blanket the peaks ♪
♪ Long forgotten faces, long forgotten things ♪
♪ Find the way back to Vermeil ♪
♪ Take me home ♪
♪ Bright red clouds ♪
10:37 A.M. - Cloudy Skies
Siracusa Low Catastrophe Sector - Wilderness - Cabin in the Woods
I heard you singing. There is no need to hide. I bear you no ill will.
...The headsmen all say that. But in the end, they draw blood.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Headsman? I am afraid I do not understand your wording. I represent the Laterano Notarial Hall——
Shut up! You can't fool me!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I gotcha!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: You did not.
Eeh?!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Pardon.
Target escaped out the window. Quick response time.
Environment analyzed. Cured fowl meat, tanning bench, processed animal skins, worked with wooden tools and small knives.
Drop the bow. I am aware of your position, hiding behind the window.
I repeat, I bear you no ill will.
——No way!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Your awareness of your surroundings is impressive.
I'll turn you into a pincushion!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: H- he caught it with his hand?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: But... what the hell are you?!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: As the report states, the heir is fickle, slow to trust, and difficult to communicate with.
The above is my last will and testament in its entirety.
However, I have one final, selfish request.
In the forests of Siracusa, I met a one-armed Vulpo girl.
She had long walked a single-minded path of revenge.
In my compassion, I gave her aid. While this may have hurt her pride, I found myself moved by her stubborn determination to survive.
I later learned that the aid I gave her only strengthened her obsession with revenge, which left me uneasy.
I want to give her all that I have. Sadly, that is very little. Only a few sad heirlooms.
——Pardon the interruption, but there is no Vulpo on your list of kin. This will make our work rather difficult.
As such, this is but a petty request from a childless Laterano citizen on his deathbed.
(I smell blood on him. And he gives me a nasty feeling...)
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: (Another fella coming to wreck up our homestead? Gross!)
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: He took the bait!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I see. Another trap. There are trigger mechanisms all over.
Listen up! You walked right into a hunter's trap. If you don't wanna die, hand over your weapons and don't move!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: If that will aid communication, I will comply.
Who are you?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I am an executor from the Laterano Notarial Hall, working as executor of this estate. You may call me 'Executor.'
Laterano...?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: 'Vermeil,' you are the target of my mission.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: How do you know my name?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Your name was given by the deceased, Mr Dürrenmatt.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: I don't know any Dürrenmatt.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: For several reasons, he used a variety of aliases.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Where do you wanna take me?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: In the interests of secrecy, I cannot say.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: ...Grr, you're full of it! You're gonna die here!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I'm not leaving. My mom, my dad, my uncle, my auntie, my friends, my people, they're all, all...
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: My task is to bring only you.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Shut up! Do you even know where you are?!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I am in a situation in which I am unable to advance my mission.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Hrmph. Anything that walks into this forest is our prey.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: The bones you're standing on are all beasts and even worse people.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I understand. The area around this base of operations was full of traps.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Pits, snares, landmines, triggered darts.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Rest assured, I have disarmed them all. The traps were of basic construction, but carried the possibility of injuring the object.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Please, come with me.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: ——! Stay back!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: One step closer and I'll shoot you dead!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: She escaped again.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Hey, why did you save me?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I'm a hunter too, after all.
attributes.name: Old Huntsman

attributes.content: How could I look past a respected colleague, short one arm and lying in a pile of her own guts next to a big old tusker?
attributes.name: Old Huntsman

attributes.content: Hmph... You're no hunter. You can't fool me. I don't smell any dirt on you at all.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Hah. I guess I can't. But when I saw you there, I was moved by how well a little one like you had conquered the wilderness. That's the truth.
attributes.name: Old Huntsman

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Just saying what comes to mind.
attributes.name: Old Huntsman

attributes.content: What's the deal with the circle on your head? And the thingies on your back?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Have you never seen a Laterano before, Little One?
attributes.name: Old Huntsman

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: These are... I guess they're what's left of my homeland I walked away from.
attributes.name: Old Huntsman

attributes.content: You can't ever clean off the dirt from your hometown.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Maybe you're right. The short of it is, a lot's happened. Come, let's try to get you walking.
attributes.name: Old Huntsman

attributes.content: Let me put this on you.
attributes.name: Old Huntsman

attributes.content: This... it's an arm? A metal arm? What a weird thing.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: A token of my respect for a child of the wilderness.
attributes.name: Old Huntsman

attributes.content: You a carpenter? A metalworker?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I learned all sorts of things in my old job.
attributes.name: Old Huntsman

attributes.content: ...You saved me, so you can't be bad. I'm gonna need an arm to get my revenge. So thank you.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Revenge, huh...? Well, I can't decide your fate for you.
attributes.name: Old Huntsman

attributes.content: But when you pull your bowstring with this arm, I hope you'll think about why it is we're alive, besides revenge.
attributes.name: Old Huntsman

attributes.content: If you don't think enough, you might just end up like me.
attributes.name: Old Huntsman

attributes.content: I don't want to hear you say 'I live for revenge.' That's too cliche.
attributes.name: Old Huntsman

attributes.content: ...Damn right. Totally played out.
attributes.name: Old Huntsman

attributes.content: (Laterano... He said he's from Laterano...)
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: (It couldn't be...)
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Ack! That hurts!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: It seems Mr Dürrenmatt's assessment was correct.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Damn it, how long have you been hunting me?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Hey! Let me go!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Stop resisting. I cannot hurt you, as you are the heir to this will.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: This is a letter from the deceased.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Why do you continue to resist?
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: ...That's his scent. The letter has the scent of his blood. What did you do to him?!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: The journey from Laterano to this place was extremely long. It is not possible that any scent of the deceased remains.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Answer me! Or I'll kill you!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Agh!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: First, I believe demonstrating the power differential at hand may aid in communication.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Second, out of respect for you as the heir, I will answer your question.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Mr Dürrenmatt died on the operating table. It was not a peaceful passing. He suffered from an incurable disease.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: You——! Let go!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Such was his choice.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Hey! Wh- what are you doing?!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Originium crystals have already pierced the skin. The infection continues to worsen.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: None of your business!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: If the object insists on rejecting her benefit, according to regulations, I am permitted to abandon the task.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: But the client and my superiors issued a subordinating clause. I must execute it.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: ——What the hell are you trying to do?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: 'Let Vermeil live.'
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: As this is a rather broad request, executing it will be quite complicated. It is my hope that you cooperate.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: ...That's what he asked you to do?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Correct. He sold all of his property, paid a number of additional fees, including those of the Notarial Hall, as well as the costs of your future medical treatment.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: But, why? I'm just some girl from the forest...
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: He wants you to live.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: And I'm asking why!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Because he believed you deserve to live.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Now that the last will and testament has been executed, my work here is done.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Wh...! When did you slip this to me——?!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Before we proceed to the next phase, I must hear your reply.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: 'Do you want to live?'
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: You need only answer: 'Yes,' or 'no.'
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Our time is limited.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Hey, Mister, what am I supposed to call you?
——Executor. If you must call me something.
Thank you for accepting my request.
——It was the Notarial Hall's decision. I am merely executing my duties.
Hah, sure enough. And while you're looking for Vermeil, I have another little request.
——Depending on the nature of the request, I may reject your verbal appeal. I would prefer you submit it in written form to the Notarial Hall.
You're a real hardass, huh? Doesn't matter. It's just a little thing.
Don't tell her anything about my past, if you can. Make up some story. Tell her I died on the operating table.
——I do not understand the need for this request. Nor does it fit with the truth. You fled the Notarial Hall's justice for many years, and you shot dead...
Enough. What if I told you doing it this way would save you a lot of trouble in getting your job done?
——If in my judgment I agree with your assessment, I will consider your request.
...So this Rhodes Island place, they can really cure this crazy disease?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Medical science has yet to cure Oripathy. But they may be able to alleviate your suffering.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Considering what you did to the Ursus, I advise against continuing to act alone.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: And it just happens that I must go to Rhodes Island on another matter.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Are you asking me to go with you?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I believe that would be most logical.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Hmph. I refuse.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I still have a lot to do before I can leave here. I have to say goodbye to my people.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: It is dangerous here. Hatred does not end in compromise.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Hmph... You sure know a lot.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I don't care what you know. Don't get in my way. I can still go to this Rhodes Island place even after I settle everything, can't I?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Allow me to calculate.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I must calculate if I have enough ammunition to deal with those fugitives when they find you again.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Ammunition...? You mean you would go out into the barrens with me?!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: In accordance with your answer, you have been marked by the Notarial Hall as having accepted your inheritance.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: However, the contents of the will have not been fully executed. I cannot allow you to expose yourself to such danger. This is my duty.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: I don't need your help! I'm used to being on my own——
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Furthermore, I believe you seek to compromise with me, and then seize the opportunity to escape.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Ugh.
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: There is no time to waste. Let us depart.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Hey! I didn't say yes! I don't need some outlander to come and... Hey, wait! Where are you going? Do you even know the way?!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Watch your feet, there's——
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: I have disarmed the traps. Come with me.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Aaah——Sooner or later, I'll show you, you weirdo——!
attributes.name: Vermeil

attributes.content: Please take good care of her, Mr Executor. Really, it could be good for you too.
Don't give me that look. You know what I mean.
Get her out of that mud hole. Don't let her end up like me.
Justice? Maybe what I did was justified, Mister, if the Notarial Hall could find it in their hearts to forgive me.
But it still wouldn't be anything to cheer about. Honestly, it just makes life seem like a big joke.
Her. She's my legacy though.
My hopes and dreams.
May the Lord bless her and keep her.
